title: Customer Experience Practical Competency Enhancement: Critical Reflection and Writing Skill Improvement for Social Work Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Holder of Level 1 Social Worker certification or equivalent practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can write 500-character critical reflection journals twice weekly based on cases encountered in social welfare settings.
Learners can write a 1,000-character policy analysis report from a social constructivist perspective and incorporate peer feedback.
Learners can create a digital concept map explaining the linkage between theory, practice, and policy and deliver an oral presentation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
